title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 701.1 - General conditions applying to all water classifications
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 701.1 - General conditions applying to all water classifications

State Regulations

The discharge of sewage, industrial waste or other wastes
shall not cause impairment of the best usages of the receiving water as
specified by the water classifications at the location of discharge and at
other locations that may be affected by such discharge. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
701.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
